data: The revival in Paradise Valley, conducted by the Reverend Silas Crafts, of South Tredegar, was in the middle of its second week, and the field—to use Brother Crafts' own word—was white to the harvest.

The revival in Paradise Valley, conducted by the Reverend Silas Crafts, of South Tredegar, was in the middle of its second week, and the field--to use Brother Crafts' own word--was white to the harvest.
Lynde, Francis, 1856-1930; Ashe, E. M. (Edmund Marion), 1867-1941 [Illustrator]
